S.FORM: == Ni-ku-la.ke-pay-ni尼古拉·哥白尼 == 尼古拉·哥白尼(拉丁語:Nicolaus Copernicus,波蘭語:Mikołaj Kopernik,1473年2月19日－1543年5月24日) . Ni-ku-la.ke-pay-ni "La-tin a kamu, Nicolaus Copernicus Pow-lan, Mikołaj Kopernik, i 1473 a mihacaan 2 a bulad 19 a demiad katukuh 5 a bulad 24 a demiad u nalimaan misulitay kacumelakan a mihcaan su-sye-cya, mdigingkiway tu nu heal a tahak, patahkal musakamu tu sataliyuk a zazan nu masamuluay, musakamu tu cilal u nu kakalayan. 1543 a mihcaan ci Ke-pay ayaw a mapatay sakamu sa kaniyul nu „tahak" mahiniay nu ayzaay a ziday malingatu mikawaw tu demiaday nu misulitay tu cudad ciniza. mibuhat tu Ke-pay-ni amisumad, amicuzuh tu kesey amisumad tabaki ku paini. . Ke-pay-ni lecuhan i Hungti a luma', Pu-lu-s,uyni a kakitizaan I 1466 a mihcaan u kanatal nu Pow-an. Ke-pay-ni pakal tu nu kiwkayay hulic a micudaday, namahiza u misaydan tu, matineng tu pinaay a kamu nu kitakit, matineng misulit tu nu misaigiay, taneng a pabelin, namala u situngusay tu kawaw, u tatengilan nu kanatal, u mitesekay tu keyzay " kilul nanay amin ku nipicudad". 1517年, . 1517 a mihcaan, Ke-pay-ni nipahezekan tu mahiniay kayadah nu kalisiw, mala u ayzaay nu misulitay tu kesey u kahenulan ku mahiniay. 1519 a mihcaan, Ke-pay-ni I To-ma-s-. ke-lye-mu ayaw nu nipahezek tu lacusay a mapakutay ku kapahay a kalisiw nizatengan. nilecuh a nikauzian身世 . nilecuh a kakitizaan ni Ke-payni. mala nuayzaay ni Ke-pay-ni pipazengan tu aazihan 1473 a mihcaanci Ke-pay-ni nilecuhani i Wi-s-wa a sa'wacan tu adidi'ay a niyazu Tu-lun, itawya itini tungusay nu Pow-lan Kowang Hingti a luma' Pu-lu-s a kuwan. u wama namakayzaay I Ke-la-ke-bu tayniay nu misiwbaya a tademaw, u wina sa nu To-lun nu tiniay nu misyubayay tatayna a wawaan, u kakitaan ku luma',cu Ke-pay-ni luma'ay sasepat a wawaan u saadidi'ay. ci Ke-pay-ni cacay a bataan ku nihca katuku sabaw tusa ku mihcaan mapatay tu ku ama, u sinaama niza ci Lu-ka-s.W-in-te ku pahabayay. 1491 a mihcaan ci Ke-pay-ni micumud tu Ke-la-ke-bu tuse Ye-cye-lung talakaw a cacudadan "iyawya ngangan Ke-la-ke-bu talakaway a cacudadan han", minanam I itini minnam tu asipay, hekalay, hulic, padekuanya, amilayap tu nu tademaway nalimaan misulitay nu nizatengan 1503 a mihcaan i bey-la-la talakaway a cacudadan pakala tu migingkiway tu hulicay a nipicudada, pawapenen nu sinaama niza tu cacay i Pow-lan-po-loway a i bayuay a Bu-lun-paw aenengan nu sinpu. 1506 a mihcaan ci Ke-pay-ni taluma' i Pow-lan, mala misaydan nu sinaama niza atu misu. 1512 a mihcaan mapatay tu ku sinaama niza, u icelang nu uzip tini tu I pasubana'ay situngus atu migingkiway tu nabakuanay, namahiza u lawad namisakawaw migingkiw tu hekalay demian misulit tu cudad. i Bo-lun-paw 30 a mihcaanan, patizeng ciniza tu cacay adidi'ay a piazih tu demiad, zikuz pangangan han "ke-pa-ni-ta", makay 17 a zidayan pala u migingkiway tu hekal u pamedacay a kakitizaan masupeday tu. nika naitawya nisulitan nu tademaw atu ci Ke-pay-ni i nu uzipay a nisulitsn aziheh, caay tu pikawaw ciniza tu piazihan tu migingikiway tu hekalay demiad, angangan ciniza malakui' tu nu ayawanan a tademaw kalaheci nu piazihan tu demiad, mikawaw tu migingkiway tu tineng aca atu migingkiw tu sapiasi tu cudad, haymaw sa masa nu uzipay tu a nigingkiwan tu hekalay demiad.

== Ni-ko-la.ke-pay-ni尼古拉·哥白尼 == 尼古拉·哥白尼(拉丁語:Nicolaos Copernicos,波蘭語:Mikołaj Kopernik,1473年2月19日－1543年5月24日) . Ni-ko-la.ke-pay-ni "La-tin a kamo, Nicolaos Copernicos Pow-lan, Mikołaj Kopernik, i 1473 a mihacaan 2 a bolad 19 a demiad katokoh 5 a bolad 24 a demiad o nalimaan misolitay kacomelakan a mihcaan so-sye-cya, mdigingkiway to no heal a tahak, patahkal mosakamo to sataliyok a zazan no masamoloay, mosakamo to cilal o no kakalayan. 1543 a mihcaan ci Ke-pay ayaw a mapatay sakamo sa kaniyol no „tahak" mahiniay no ayzaay a ziday malingato mikawaw to demiaday no misolitay to codad ciniza. mibohat to Ke-pay-ni amisomad, amicozoh to kesey amisomad tabaki ko paini. . Ke-pay-ni lecohan i Hongti a loma', Po-lo-s,oyni a kakitizaan I 1466 a mihcaan o kanatal no Pow-an. Ke-pay-ni pakal to no kiwkayay holic a micodaday, namahiza o misaydan to, matineng to pinaay a kamo no kitakit, matineng misolit to no misaigiay, taneng a pabelin, namala o sitongosay to kawaw, o tatengilan no kanatal, o mitesekay to keyzay " kilol nanay amin ko nipicodad". 1517年, . 1517 a mihcaan, Ke-pay-ni nipahezekan to mahiniay kayadah no kalisiw, mala o ayzaay no misolitay to kesey o kahenolan ko mahiniay. 1519 a mihcaan, Ke-pay-ni I To-ma-s-. ke-lye-mo ayaw no nipahezek to lacosay a mapakotay ko kapahay a kalisiw nizatengan. nilecoh a nikaozian身世 . nilecoh a kakitizaan ni Ke-payni. mala noayzaay ni Ke-pay-ni pipazengan to aazihan 1473 a mihcaanci Ke-pay-ni nilecohani i Wi-s-wa a sa'wacan to adidi'ay a niyazo To-lon, itawya itini tongosay no Pow-lan Kowang Hingti a loma' Po-lo-s a kowan. o wama namakayzaay I Ke-la-ke-bo tayniay no misiwbaya a tademaw, o wina sa no To-lon no tiniay no misyobayay tatayna a wawaan, o kakitaan ko loma',co Ke-pay-ni loma'ay sasepat a wawaan o saadidi'ay. ci Ke-pay-ni cacay a bataan ko nihca katoko sabaw tosa ko mihcaan mapatay to ko ama, o sinaama niza ci Lo-ka-s.W-in-te ko pahabayay. 1491 a mihcaan ci Ke-pay-ni micomod to Ke-la-ke-bo tose Ye-cye-long talakaw a cacodadan "iyawya ngangan Ke-la-ke-bo talakaway a cacodadan han", minanam I itini minnam to asipay, hekalay, holic, padekoanya, amilayap to no tademaway nalimaan misolitay no nizatengan 1503 a mihcaan i bey-la-la talakaway a cacodadan pakala to migingkiway to holicay a nipicodada, pawapenen no sinaama niza to cacay i Pow-lan-po-loway a i bayoay a Bo-lon-paw aenengan no sinpo. 1506 a mihcaan ci Ke-pay-ni taloma' i Pow-lan, mala misaydan no sinaama niza ato miso. 1512 a mihcaan mapatay to ko sinaama niza, o icelang no ozip tini to I pasobana'ay sitongos ato migingkiway to nabakoanay, namahiza o lawad namisakawaw migingkiw to hekalay demian misolit to codad. i Bo-lon-paw 30 a mihcaanan, patizeng ciniza to cacay adidi'ay a piazih to demiad, zikoz pangangan han "ke-pa-ni-ta", makay 17 a zidayan pala o migingkiway to hekal o pamedacay a kakitizaan masopeday to. nika naitawya nisolitan no tademaw ato ci Ke-pay-ni i no ozipay a nisolitsn aziheh, caay to pikawaw ciniza to piazihan to migingikiway to hekalay demiad, angangan ciniza malakoi' to no ayawanan a tademaw kalaheci no piazihan to demiad, mikawaw to migingkiway to tineng aca ato migingkiw to sapiasi to codad, haymaw sa masa no ozipay to a nigingkiwan to hekalay demiad.
